name: i18n-website
description: A sample website and single-page application internationalized with i18n-express.
author: Luc Sorel

scripts.dir-js: if [ ! -d  public/js ]; then mkdir -p  public/js; elif [ "$(ls -A public/js)" ]; then rm -r public/js/*; fi
scripts.build-uglyfied-js: browserify webapp/LocaleSelectorApp.js | uglifyjs -mc > public/js/locale-selector.js & browserify webapp/TodoApp.js | uglifyjs -mc > public/js/todo-app.js
scripts.build-js: browserify webapp/LocaleSelectorApp.js > public/js/locale-selector.js & browserify webapp/TodoApp.js > public/js/todo-app.js
scripts.prestart: npm run dir-js && npm run build-uglyfied-js
